java/liquibase/change/AlterSequenceChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.AlterSequenceStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Sequence;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00010 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00013 
00014 import java.util.Arrays;
00015 import java.util.HashSet;
00016 import java.util.Set;
00017 
00021 public class AlterSequenceChange extends AbstractChange {
00022 
00023     private String schemaName;
00024     private String sequenceName;
00025     private Integer incrementBy;
00026     private Integer maxValue;
00027     private Integer minValue;
00028     private Boolean ordered;
00029     // StartValue is not allowed since we cannot alter the starting sequence number
00030 
00031     public AlterSequenceChange() {
00032         super("alterSequence", "Alter Sequence");
00033     }
00034 
00035     public String getSchemaName() {
00036         return schemaName;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00040         this.schemaName = StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName);
00041     }
00042 
00043     public String getSequenceName() {
00044         return sequenceName;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public void setSequenceName(String sequenceName) {
00048         this.sequenceName = sequenceName;
00049     }
00050 
00051 
00052     public Integer getIncrementBy() {
00053         return incrementBy;
00054     }
00055 
00056     public void setIncrementBy(Integer incrementBy) {
00057         this.incrementBy = incrementBy;
00058     }
00059 
00060     public Integer getMaxValue() {
00061         return maxValue;
00062     }
00063 
00064     public void setMaxValue(Integer maxValue) {
00065         this.maxValue = maxValue;
00066     }
00067 
00068     public Integer getMinValue() {
00069         return minValue;
00070     }
00071 
00072     public void setMinValue(Integer minValue) {
00073         this.minValue = minValue;
00074     }
00075 
00076     public Boolean isOrdered() {
00077         return ordered;
00078     }
00079 
00080     public void setOrdered(Boolean ordered) {
00081         this.ordered = ordered;
00082     }
00083 
00084     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00085         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(sequenceName) == null) {
00086             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("sequenceName is required", this);
00087         }
00088 
00089     }
00090 
00091     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00092         if (!database.supportsSequences()) {
00093             throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Sequences do not exist in "+database.getProductName());
00094         }
00095 
00096         return new SqlStatement[] {
00097                 new AlterSequenceStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getSequenceName())
00098                 .setIncrementBy(getIncrementBy())
00099                 .setMaxValue(getMaxValue())
00100                 .setMinValue(getMinValue())
00101                 .setOrdered(isOrdered())
00102         };
00103     }
00104 
00105     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00106         return "Sequence " + getSequenceName() + " altered";
00107     }
00108 
00109     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00110         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("alterSequence");
00111         node.setAttribute("sequenceName", getSequenceName());
00112         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00113             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00114         }
00115         if (getMinValue() != null) {
00116             node.setAttribute("minValue", getMinValue().toString());
00117         }
00118         if (getMaxValue() != null) {
00119             node.setAttribute("maxValue", getMaxValue().toString());
00120         }
00121         if (getIncrementBy() != null) {
00122             node.setAttribute("incrementBy", getIncrementBy().toString());
00123         }
00124         if (isOrdered() != null) {
00125             node.setAttribute("ordered", isOrdered().toString());
00126         }
00127 
00128         return node;
00129     }
00130 
00131     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00132         Sequence dbObject = new Sequence();
00133         dbObject.setName(sequenceName);
00134 
00135         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(dbObject));
00136     }
00137 }
